SEARCH
Module melange.common
Package gbw.melange.common.elementary.space

Interface ISpace

All Superinterfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
All Known Subinterfaces:
IScreenSpace
public interface ISpace extends com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
A given ISpace may represent an area within which all assigned element's constraints must be resolved.
It is a way to limit cascading events, and to let elements be dynamically sized and positioned efficiently.
Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
GustavBW
